title: Cross-Platform
description: React Native allows for a single codebase to be used for both Android and iOS platforms- saving time and resources.

title: Trusted by Billions of Users
description: React Native was used for the Facebook and Instagram mobile apps- which are used by billions of users daily.

title: Swift Deployment
description: Mobile apps built with React Native can be quickly deployed and made go live, due to most of the code being reusable, and a seamless modular structure.

title: 3rd Party Integrations
description: Since React Native uses JavaScript, we have access to a wide range of 3rd party APIs and tools.

title: Modular Structure
description: React Native's modular structure is key to its success: the same modules can be used across different APIs for fast results.

title: Powerful Performance
description: The platform is also powerful when it comes to performance, making use of GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) rather than CPU (Central Processing Unit) to ensure a smooth experience.
